_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: CoreBot DiscordEgg (NodeJS 12) V1.7
author: lloyd@lloyd.best
description:
CoreBot Egg,
Whenever you create a server please DO NOT delete node_modules. This will uninstall sodium.
You will also need (apt-get install autoconf automake g++ libtool build-essential) installed checkout more on https://docs.corebot.dev/en/Setup/Dependencies

installation.script:
#/bin/ash

apk add --no-cache git make gcc g++ python curl

cd /mnt/server
rm -rf .config/
rm -rf .npm/
rm -rf node_modules/
echo "Downloading Package 1"
curl https://egg.lloyd.best/node.zip -O -J -L
echo "Unzipping Package 1"
unzip -o node.zip
echo "Removing Package zip"
rm -rf node.zip
echo "The script is done... Sadly"
echo " "
echo "-------------------------"
echo " "
echo "Thank you for using Lloyd.Best's Pterodactyl Egg"
echo "For CoreBot. Please go to File Management then upload Corebot.zip"
echo "Then right click and extract"
echo "If you need any further Support for Pterodactyl. Feel free to contact us in discord.gg/zTwxvFD"
echo "If you need any further Support for CoreBot. Please ask in the COREBOT discord!"
echo " "
echo -e "-------------------------"
exit 0

variables.name: Startup file
variables.description: The file that starts the bot.

variables.name: Additional Startup Command
variables.description: If you want to disable sqlite3 installing please type --no-install
